title: 06/14/2021 - HOUR 3 - Greg Olsen, Chris Paul, NBA Playoffs
itunes:title: 06/14/2021 - HOUR 3 - Greg Olsen, Chris Paul, NBA Playoffs
description:
In hour 3, Colin recaps the NBA playoffs thus far and Chris Paul's contributions to his teams. Greg Olsen joins to talk family, football and much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
